Package XSLForms :: Module Utils

Module XSLForms.Utils

Utility functions for XSLForms documents.

Function Summary
  add_elements(positions, *element_names)
At the specified 'positions' in a document, add a new element using the first of the given 'element_names' inside any subsequent element named in the 'element_names' list, in turn creating new parent elements for each element name found.
  remove_elements(positions)
Remove the elements located at the given 'positions'.

Function Details

add_elements(positions, *element_names) 

At the specified 'positions' in a document, add a new element using the
first of the given 'element_names' inside any subsequent element named in
the 'element_names' list, in turn creating new parent elements for each
element name found.

remove_elements(positions) 

Remove the elements located at the given 'positions'.
